name: Summon Volatile Familiar
description: Command the powers of Oblivion to send a Daedric familiar to fight at your side. The familiar's attacks deal 358 Shock Damage.  Once summoned, you can activate the familiar's special ability for 3510 Magicka, dealing 599 Shock Damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds to enemies near him. The final pulse will stun all enemies hit for 3 seconds.  The familiar remains until killed or unsummoned.
effectLines: You summon a volatile familiar. Once summoned, you can activate the familiar's special ability to pulse area damage and stun enemies.
